PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-14382018-11-22,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  TC
ActRailway Safety Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Grade Crossings Regulations and the Prevention and Control of Fires on Line Works Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending the GRADE CROSSINGS REGULATIONS AND THE PREVENTION AND CONTROL OF FIRES ON LINE WORKS REGULATIONS (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to (1) correct discrepancies between the French and English versions; (2) add clarity to regulatory provisions; (3) correct typographical or grammatical errors; and, (4) update references to standards and other incorporation-by-reference documents
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0256 Publication Date: 2018-12-12
AttachmentsAttachment
